title: Hello GD, Akivir here.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
This is my follow up post. It's about one year overdue I think.

I've been playing Teemo ever since Hide and Seek was deleted.

If you went to OPL 2016 you might have seen me holding a particularly cancerous poster. The link attached shows said poster.

Since the forums died I got a job, found a nice girlfriend and moved to a different town. Life's been good.

So my question is -

How have you guys been?
